meta.title: River Ridge School District - Coronavirus - COVID19 Updates

link.title: Coronavirus - COVID19 Updates - River Ridge School District
Coronavirus - COVID19 Updates - River Ridge School District

div.div: No classes will be held at River Ridge School District starting Monday, March 16 through April 24. We will keep our school community updated regarding Virtual/Alternate learning from home.

td.p: The River Ridge School District is working closely with the Grant County Health Department and Wisconsin Department of Health Services to stay informed on the most current information and recommendations regarding the coronavirus. The health and safety of our students, staff, families, and community is a top priority if it becomes necessary for us to respond to the spread of COVID-19 here in Southwest Wisconsin.
This page will be updated as more information becomes available.
